# contentView

**Instance Property**

The main view for the lockup.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentView: UIView { get }
```

## Discussion

Add subviews to the `contentView`. Don’t add views direcly to the lockup view.

## Adding subviews

- **headerView**: A view containing header information.
- **footerView**: A view containing footer information.
title: contentView
